TEXT.TITLE: GUY F. ATKINSON CO <ATKN.O> UNIT WINS CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY: Guy F. Atkinson Co said its Guy F. Atkinson Construction Co won a multi-million-dlr contract to construct a station for the Metro Rail Project in Los Angeles. Construction on the proposed station wil begin this month, with completion scheduled for February, 1990. Reuter
